thread.title: BRIEF-Vectren Announces Location For 50 MW of Renewable Energy In Southwestern Indiana

title: BRIEF-Vectren Announces Location For 50 MW of Renewable Energy In Southwestern Indiana
text: March 13, 2018 / 2:02 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Vectren Announces Location For 50 MW of Renewable Energy In Southwestern Indiana Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - First Solar Inc: * VECTREN SELECTS PARTNER, ANNOUNCES LOCATION FOR 50 MEGAWATTS OF RENEWABLE ENERGY IN SOUTHWESTERN INDIANA * FIRST SOLAR INC SAYS VECTREN HAS SELECTED CO TO BUILD 50 MW SOLAR ARRAY OUTLINED AS PART OF VECTREN’S LONG-TERM ELECTRIC GENERATION TRANSITION PLAN * FIRST SOLAR - ‍FACILITY SHOULD BE FULLY OPERATIONAL IN 2020, EXPECTED TO GENERATE ENOUGH POWER TO MEET NEEDS OF MORE THAN 11,000 HOUSEHOLDS PER YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
